item.title: Ike Kligerman Barkley
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
A minimal gridded website for a New York and San Francisco architecture firm. The site layout was based around the horizontal half way point to give the brand designed by Commune, a strong impact.

The post Ike Kligerman Barkley appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
A minimal gridded website for a New York and San Francisco architecture firm. The site layout was based around the horizontal half way point to give the brand designed by Commune, a strong impact.

The post Ike Kligerman Barkley appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Commune
item.dc:creator: Matthew Gordils
item.description:
Commune is a design collective that spans interior design, graphic design and web design to assemble the best team for each project.

The post Commune appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
Commune is a design collective that spans interior design, graphic design and web design to assemble the best team for each project.

The post Commune appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Honor
item.dc:creator: Matthew Gordils
item.description:
An ecommerce website for Honor, a high-end women’s fashion brand. The branding was created by RoAndCo. The site design and development was created at NoFavorite in Collaboration with High Tide Creative.

The post Honor appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
An ecommerce website for Honor, a high-end women’s fashion brand. The branding was created by RoAndCo. The site design and development was created at NoFavorite in Collaboration with High Tide Creative.

The post Honor appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: BHQFU
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
BHQFU is a learning experiment started by the Bruce High Quality Foundation with a goal of creating a community of artists.

The post BHQFU appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
